name: Hopper (JolyonT)
description:
Jane Hopper jumps between dimensions in order to gather research for her database. Using her intergalactic temporal discombobulator  she must collect artefacts that have been scattered across the planes of the multiverse. 

Programming - Tegan Morgan

Sound Design - Jolyon Thittichai

Environment - Quinn Miller, Josie May, Danai Logotheti, Tegan Morgan

Sprite Art -  Quinn Miller, Josie May, Danai Logotheti, Tegan Morgan, Jolyon Thittichai

Menus - Quinn Miller, Danai Logotheti, Jolyon Thittichai
